quote: But I will judge the nation they will serve, and after that they will go out with many goods.
So Caʹleb drove out from there the three sons of Aʹnak: Sheʹshai, A·hiʹman, and Talʹmai, descendants of Aʹnak.
So the priests and the Levites sanctified themselves to bring up the Ark of Jehovah the God of Israel.
